title: Find a way into Wyrm's Rock fortress
tags: find a way into wyrms rock fortress
content: confrontation with Gortash, Dark Urge can walk in through the gate by speaking to Blaze Elin at the gate. Alternatively, you can get a pass from Valeria (Solve the Open Hand Temple Murders), or from Arfur Gregario, the Toymaker (Investigate the Suspicious Toys). Get A report on Duke Ravengard at Sword Coast Couriers. Or simply convince the Guards to let you in. Once you break into Iron Throne and save the Gondians, the Wyrm's Rock Fortress is closed by Gortash's order. You can jump to the surro
